about_the_game:
Strap into your VR headsets, because Karting is now fully immersive! Get ready to dive into the adrenaline-pumping world of kart racing like never before. Explore thrilling tracks, compete head-to-head with racers from across the globe, and fine-tune your kart to become the ultimate champion! Kart 360 in VR is where speed meets skill, and where legends are forged in the heat of intense virtual competition.



Experience heart-pounding races in the immersive world of VR! Compete against skilled players from around the world, upgrade your racing karts, and hone your reflexes and focus to claim victory. So, gear up, power on your VR setup, and let's hit the virtual tracks!



Embark on a journey through challenging VR tracks that will push your skills to the limit and leave your rivals for dust. Mastering the art of navigating corners in VR will truly elevate your racing prowess. Enhance your kart with VR upgrades for an even more exhilarating experience!"


With Kart 360 now in full VR immersion, the thrill of kart racing reaches new heights.
Have you tried out the VR Kart 360 yet?



  • Fully Immersive VR Experience:
Dive into the heart-pounding excitement of kart racing like never before. Feel every turn, every bump, and every moment of speed in the fully immersive world of VR.

  • Thrilling Tracks:
Explore a variety of challenging tracks that will push your racing skills to the limit. Each track is designed to test your reflexes, strategy, and precision.

  • Global Competition:
Compete head-to-head with skilled racers from across the globe. Climb the leaderboards, prove your prowess, and become the ultimate kart racing champion.

  • Customizable Karts:
Fine-tune your kart to match your racing style. Upgrade your kart with new parts, improve its performance, and enhance its appearance to stand out on the track.

  • Intense Head-to-Head Races:
Engage in intense, adrenaline-pumping races against both AI opponents and real players. Experience the thrill of competitive racing in a fully immersive environment.

  • Skill Mastery:
Hone your reflexes and focus to navigate sharp corners, overtake rivals, and maintain your lead. Mastering the art of kart racing in VR will elevate your skills to new heights.

  • VR:
Enhance your kart with VR exhilarating experience. Feel the speed and thrill of kart racing with heightened realism and immersion.

Why You'll Love Kart 360 VR:


Experience the ultimate kart racing adventure where every race is a new challenge, every track is a new thrill, and every victory brings you closer to becoming a legend. With stunning visuals, realistic physics, and an immersive VR environment, Kart 360 VR is the definitive kart racing experience for racing enthusiasts and VR gamers alike.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHZ or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.13 High Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8000 Series or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: VR Kart 360*

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR. HTC Vive Cosmos, HTC Vive, Oculus CV1, Meta Quest 2, and Oculus Rift S
  • Additional Notes: VR ONLY!
